TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tokar, title = Tokar, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokar} }

S.FORM: Tokar Itiniay i Yuli Cen no Hualien ko Tokar a niyaro', 137 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 355 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 332 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 23 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Pangcah/'Amis 88%, Bunun 1%, Tayal 1%, roma 5%. Ira ko picodadan no wawa i niyaro' Kwan-Yin ko-syaw hananay.

Tokar Itiniay i Yoli Cen no Hoalien ko Tokar a niyaro', 137 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 355 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 332 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 23 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Pangcah/'Amis 88%, Bonon 1%, Tayal 1%, roma 5%. Ira ko picodadan no wawa i niyaro' Kwan-Yin ko-syaw hananay.
